title: 820-4924-a not detecting SSD
message: SSD is ok, checked it on other macbook. Cant find any problem on logic board. No water damage. Just stop working 1 day.

title: 820-4924-a not detecting SSD
message:
Is the original SSD from that board?
No APFS issue for sure?

title: 820-4924-a not detecting SSD
message: yes, original, no apfs issue. In Disk utility there is no disk.

title: 820-4924-a not detecting SSD
message: Also checked connector from inside and all pins are present ( no broken pin or something like that)

title: 820-4924-a not detecting SSD
message: Post U3740 voltages, with SSD connected.

title: 820-4924-a not detecting SSD
message:
Replaced U3740 and now get:

1 - 3.4 V
2 - 1V
3- 3.3 V
4- 3.4V

5- 0V
6 - 3.2V
7 - 0.4V-0.7V Pulsing
8 - 0V

title: 820-4924-a not detecting SSD
message:
Now all voltages are correct.
Still not detecting SSD?

title: 820-4924-a not detecting SSD
message:
No.

Pin 8 0V is ok?

Also sometime pin 7 is giving 1.2V

title: 820-4924-a not detecting SSD
message:
Pins 7 & 8 must be 0V, all the time SSD is connected.
Pay atention at end "_L" in the signal names...

Check for acorrosion around U3710/11, be sure R3700/03 are good.
Also check all the caps from PCIE lines of SSD.
Compare diode mode readings on the data lines to ground, with known good board.

title: 820-4924-a not detecting SSD
message: thanks informaticos. So my pin 7 is wrong if it 1.2V now. Will check it all tomorrow and write here.

title: 820-4924-a not detecting SSD
message:
Thanks. IT was C3717. 

Note: Pin 7 and Pin 8 on 3740 is 1.2V when SSD is conected and working.

title: 820-4924-a not detecting SSD
message: 1.2V not really good, but low enough under high level threeshold.
